device.name: Rocker Switch, 2 Rocker
device.description: Light and blind control with 2 state

attribute.name: State
attribute.description: Represents the rocker state

attribute.name: Value
attribute.description: Represents the rocker value

attribute.name: EventType
attribute.description: This attribute represents if the sensor throws events periodically (period) or on external event (event).

attribute.name: State
attribute.description: Represents the rocker state

attribute.name: Value
attribute.description: Represents the rocker value state

attribute.name: EventType
attribute.description: This attribute represents if the sensor throws events periodically (period) or on external event (event).

attribute.name: State
attribute.description: Represents the button current state

attribute.name: Position
attribute.description: Represents the postion of the button

attribute.name: EventType
attribute.description: This attribute represents if the sensor throws events periodically (period) or on external event (event).

attribute.name: State
attribute.description: Represents the handle current state

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Represents the postion of the handle : 0 : Closed - handle down 1 : Closed - handle up 2 : Opened clockwise 3 : Opened counter-clockwise

attribute.name: EventType
attribute.description: This attribute represents if the sensor throws events periodically (period) or on external event (event).

device.name: Window Contact
device.description: Information on the status of a window (Open/Closed)

attribute.name: State
attribute.description: Represents the contact current state

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Represents the postion of the windows (Open/Closed)

attribute.name: EventType
attribute.description: This attribute represents if the sensor throws events periodically (period) or on external event (event).

device.name: Temperature sensor
device.description: This device measures the temperature in a room.

attribute.name: State
attribute.description: Represents the sensor current state

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Represents the value of temperature

attribute.name: Unit
attribute.description: This attribute represents the temperature measuring unit. It is the abbreviation of the UnitName.

attribute.name: EventType
attribute.description: This attribute represents if the sensor throws events periodically (period) or on external event (event).

device.name: Temperature and Humidity Sensor
device.description: This device measures the temperature and the humidity in a room.

attribute.name: State
attribute.description: Represents the sensor current state

attribute.name: valueTemperature
attribute.description: Represents the temperature in the room.

attribute.name: UnitTemperature
attribute.description: This attribute represents the temperature measuring unit. It is the abbreviation of the UnitName.

attributes.attribute:
Represents the temperature in the room.
valueHumidity
Represents the humidity in the room.

attribute.name: UnitHumidity
attribute.description: This attribute represents the humidity measuring unit. It is the abbreviation of the UnitName.

attribute.name: EventType
attribute.description: This attribute represents if the sensor throws events periodically (period) or on external event (event).

device.name: Light Sensor
device.description: this devices measures the light intensity in the room

attribute.name: State
attribute.description: Represents the sensor current state

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Represents the light intensity

attribute.name: Unit
attribute.description: This attribute represents the light intensity measuring unit. It is the abreviation of the UnitName.

attribute.name: EventType
attribute.description: This attribute represents if the sensor throws events periodically (period) or on external event (event).

device.name: Occupancy Sensor
device.description: This device detect the presence of a person in the room

attribute.name: State
attribute.description: Represents the sensor current state

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Presence or not

attribute.name: EventType
attribute.description: This attribute represents if the sensor throws events periodically (period) or on external event (event).

device.description: This device measure the light intensity and the temperature of the piece and detect the presence of a person in the room

attribute.name: valueIntensity
attribute.description: Represents the light intensity

attribute.name: UnitIntensity
attribute.description: This attribute represents the light intensity measuring unit. It is the abreviation of the UnitName.

attribute.name: valueOccupancy
attribute.description: Presence or not

attribute.name: EventType
attribute.description: This attribute represents if the sensor throws events periodically (period) or on external event (event).

device.description: It is a set of sensors embedded in the same device

attribute.name: valueTemperature

attribute.name: valueSetPoint
attribute.description: Represents the value of SetPoint control system

attribute.name: valueFanSpeed
attribute.description: put the speed you want

attribute.name: StageFanSpeed
attribute.description: This attribute represents the differents stage of fan speed.

attribute.description: information on the day (on) or night (off)

attribute.name: valueOccupancy
attribute.description: Presence or not

attribute.description: information on the state of window (Open/close)
